bs-review-desc:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of review extension
The review functionality is really basic. For an existing page, reviewers can be added, which can give a vote in a period of time whether the content is okay or not.
prefs-review:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for review section in preferences.
{{Identical|Review}}
bs-review-review:
Used as a window title and headline
{{Identical|Review}}
bs-review-menu-entry:
Used in content actions menu as an anchor text
{{Identical|Edit review}}
bs-review-date: Text message that not all participants have voted on a review yet.
bs-review-agreed: Text message that all participants have agreed on a review.
bs-review-denied-disagreed: Error message that at least one participant has disagreed on a review.
bs-review-pending:
Text message that a review is not yet finished.
{{Identical|Pending}}
bs-review-review-finished: Success message that this page has been reviewed.
bs-review-reviewed-till:
Text message that this page is being reviewed for some time.
*$1 is the start date
*$2 is the end date
bs-review-reviewed-till-extra:
Text message that this review was created by someone.
*$1 is the username - use for GENDER distinction
* is the real name of the user
bs-review-save-success: Success message that review was assigned.
bs-review-save-error: Error message that an error occurred while the review was saved.
bs-review-save-removed: Success message that a review was deleted.
bs-review-save-nosteps: Error Message that no review steps were entered.
bs-review-save-noid: Error message that no page ID was sent an so the review can not be created.
bs-review-save-norights: Error message that the user who wants to create the review does not have necessary permission.
bs-review-review-error: Error message for an unknown error occurred.
bs-review-review-secondtime: Error message that a review could not be found. A possible reason is that the user tries to vote again
bs-review-review-saved: Success message that the the vote of a user was saved.
bs-review-mail-link-to-page:
Text message that a user should follow this link.
$1 is the link
bs-review-mail-invite-header:
Mail subject that a user should review a page.
* $1 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-invite-body:
Mail body that another user invited someone, to make a review of a page.
* $1 is the real name of the user who invited)
* $2 is the name of the user who invited - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-comment:
Optional mail body that a comment was entered.
* $1 is the comment.
bs-review-mail-accept-header:
Mail subject that a user has accepted.
* $1 is the real name of the user, who accepted
* $2 is the name of the user, who accepted - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-accept-body:
Mail body that a user has accepted.
* $1 is the real name of the user, who accepted
* $2 is the name of the user, who accepted - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-deny-header:
Mail subject that a user has denied.
* $1 is the real name of the user, who denied
* $2 is the name of the user, who denied - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-deny-body:
Mail body that a user has denied.
* $1 is the real name of the user, who denied
* $2 is the name of the user, who denied - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-deny-and-restart-header:
Mail subject that a user denied and the review will be restarted.
* $1 is the real name of the user, who denied
* $2 is the name of the user, who denied - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-deny-and-restart-body:
Mail body that a user denied and the review will be restarted.
* $1 is the real name of the user, who denied
* $2 is the name of the user, who denied - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-finish-header:
Mail subject that the review was finished.
* $1 is the real name of the user, who accepted
* $2 is the name of the user, who accepted - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-finish-body:
Mail body that the review was finished.
* $1 is the real name of the user, who accepted
* $2 is the name of the user, who accepted - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-finish-and-review-header:
Mail subject that the review was finished and was marked as stable
* $1 is the real name of the user, who accepted
* $2 is the name of the user, who accepted - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-mail-finish-and-review-body:
Mail body that the review was finished and was marked as stable
* $1 is the real name of the user, who accepted
* $2 is the name of the user, who accepted - Use GENDER destinction
* $3 is the name of page which should be reviewed
bs-review-statebar-body-do-review: Headline for the review section inside the state bar.
bs-review-i-agree:
Button label that you agree you reviewed this page
{{Identical|Agree}}
bs-review-i-dismiss:
Button label that you disagree you reviewed this page
{{Identical|Disagree}}
bs-review-not-allowed: Error message that you are not allowed to access this page.
bs-review-created-review:
Log message that someone started a review on a page.
*$1 is the username of the user
*$2 is the name of the page as a link.
bs-review-modified-review:
Log message that someone changed a review on page.
*$1 is the username of the user
*$2 is the name of the page as a link.
bs-review-deleted-review:
Log message that someone deleted a review on page.
*$1 is the username of the user
*$2 is the name of the page as a link.
bs-review-approved-review:
Log message that someone accepted a review on page.
*$1 is the username of the user
*$2 is the name of the page as a link.
bs-review-denied-review:
Log message that someone denied a review on page.
*$1 is the username of the user
*$2 is the name of the page as a link.
bs-review-finished-review:
Log message that someone finished a review on page.
*$1 is the username of the user
*$2 is the name of the page as a link.
log-name-bs-review: Used in [[Special:Log]], headline for review log
log-description-bs-review: Used in [[Special:Log]], log description for BlueSpice review log.
bs-review-pref-checkowner: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for only the owner of a review can change it
bs-review-pref-shownameintooltip: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for show names of the participants
bs-review-pref-emailnotifyowner: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for notify the owner of a review about changes
bs-review-pref-emailnotifyreviewer: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for notify the reviewer of a review about changes
bs-review-expired:
Error message that the review has expired
{{Identical|Expired}}
bs-review-denied: Error message that the review had to be returned and needs to be reviewed again
bs-review-specialreview-header:
Title of the special page. Special page title can be for a user or for an overview over all existing reviews. This depends on whether a user is passed as a parameter to the special page.
* $1 is the number if a user is passed
**0 means overview over all reviews
**1 reviews of one specific user
*$2 is the real name of the user
bs-review-titleaddreviewer:
Window title for add reviewer
{{Identical|Add reviewer}}
bs-review-header-accepted-text:
Column headline for the state of a review
{{Identical|State}}
bs-review-confirm-delete-step: Text message if you want to delete a step of a review
bs-review-confirm-delete-review: Text message if you want to delete the review
bs-review-error-insufficient-permissions:
Text message if user tries to do a review without the permissions.

Parameters:
* $1 - the permission they're lacking
echo-category-title-bs-review-complete-c: Settings message for notify on completing a review
echo-category-title-bs-review-assignment: Label for assignment messages, used in [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo]]
echo-category-title-bs-review-action-cat: Label for action messages, used in [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo]]
notification-bs-review-payload-comment:
Template to include review comments as payload into notifications

Parameters:
* $1 - the comment as submitted by the user
notification-bs-review-assign-summary:
Notification about invitation to review a page - flyout/archive page

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user requesting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page
notification-bs-review-assign-subject:
Notification about invitation to review a page - email subject

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user requesting a review (unused)
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)
notification-bs-review-assign-body:
Notification about invitation to review a page - email body

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user requesting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page
notification-bs-review-accept-summary:
Notification about reviewer accept changes - flyout/archive page

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user accepting a review
* $2 - name of page (unused)
* $3 - link to page
notification-bs-review-accept-subject:
Notification about reviewer accept changes - email subject

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user accepting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)
notification-bs-review-accept-body:
Notification about reviewer accept changes - email body

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user accepting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)
notification-bs-review-deny-summary:
Notification about reviewer reject changes - flyout/archive page

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user rejecting a review
* $2 - name of page (unused)
* $3 - link to page
notification-bs-review-deny-subject:
Notification about reviewer reject changes - email subject

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user rejecting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)
notification-bs-review-deny-body:
Notification about reviewer reject changes - email body

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user rejecting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)
notification-bs-review-deny-and-restart-:
Notification about reviewer reject changes and restarts review - flyout/archive page

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user rejecting a review
* $2 - name of page (unused)
* $3 - link to page

Notification about reviewer reject changes and restarts review - email subject

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user rejecting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)

Notification about reviewer reject changes and restarts review - email body

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user rejecting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)
notification-bs-review-finish-summary:
Notification about reviewer finishes review - flyout/archive page

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user accepting a review
* $2 - name of page (unused)
* $3 - link to page
notification-bs-review-finish-subject:
Notification about reviewer finishes review - email subject

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user accepting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)
notification-bs-review-finish-body:
Notification about reviewer finishes review - email body

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user accepting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)
notification-bs-review-finish-and-autofl:
Notification about reviewer finishes review and autoflags as stable - flyout/archive page

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user accepting a review
* $2 - name of page (unused)
* $3 - link to page

Notification about reviewer finishes review and autoflags as stable - email subject

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user accepting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)

Notification about reviewer finishes review and autoflags as stable - email body

Parameters:
* $1 - name of the user accepting a review
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)

bs-usagetracker-review:
Name of the descriptor used in [[Special:UsageTracker|Special:UsageTracker]] output
{{Identical|Review}}
bs-review-pref-permissions: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label of a multi select box for permissions that a user retrieves when part of a workflow
